events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and the tracking information shows no updates. My package is considerably late and I haven't received any notification about the delay.
The customer reported a significant delay in shipping and lack of tracking updates for a recent order.
Assigning the case to the shipping support specialist to investigate the delayed delivery issue.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm sorry to hear your order hasn't arrived yet. Let's see how we can assist you with the delay.
Could you please provide your order number and the tracking number you received? This will help us check the status with the courier.
My order number is 123456789 and the tracking number is XYZ987654321. I have been refreshing the tracking page but it still shows 'in transit' without any progress.
We have contacted the courier and it appears your package is delayed due to unexpected transit issues. We will expedite the investigation and update you within 48 hours.
Thank you for the update. I appreciate your help and hope to receive more information soon.
After no new updates from the courier, escalating the case to senior shipping operations for urgent intervention.
Your package has been located and is out for delivery today. We apologize for the delay and thank you for your patience.
We wanted to check in and confirm that you have received your order and that everything is satisfactory now.
Yes, I received the package today in good condition. Thank you for resolving this issue promptly.
Closing the case as the delivery delay has been resolved and the customer confirmed receipt of the package.
